text: “Gumazir ekiam, en afeziam nɨn ingangarir gumazim, kamaghɨn e ua uan afeziam bagh mangɨtɨ, afeziam gantɨ otarir kam e ko mangan koghtɨ, an nɨghnɨziba ikuvightɨ an aremegh Gumazamizir Oveaghuezibar Nguibamɨn magɨram. Guizbangɨra, otarir kam bar afeziamɨn dɨghorim. Ezɨ en afeziam a bar ghuri. Ezɨ otarir kam e ko uamategh mangɨghan koghtɨ, kamaghɨn e osɨmtɨzir ekiam afeziam danightɨ, an aremegham.
